verses.english: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
verses.hausa: Yã wanda ya lulluɓa da mayãfi.

verses.english: Arise and warn
verses.hausa: Ka tãshi dõmin ka yi gargaɗi

verses.english: And your Lord glorify
verses.hausa: Kuma Ubangijinka, sai ka girmama Shi,

verses.english: And your clothing purify
verses.hausa: Kuma tutãfinka, sai ka tsarkake su,

verses.english: And uncleanliness avoid
verses.hausa: Kuma gumãka, sai ka ƙaurace musu.

verses.english: And do not confer favor to acquire more
verses.hausa: Kada ka yi kyauta kana nẽman ƙãri

verses.english: But for your Lord be patient.
verses.hausa: Kuma sabõda Ubangijinka? Sai ka yi haƙure

verses.english: And when the trumpet is blown,
verses.hausa: To, idan aka yi bũsa a cikin ƙaho.

verses.english: That Day will be a difficult day
verses.hausa: To, wannan, a rãnar nan, yini ne mai wuya

verses.english: For the disbelievers - not easy.
verses.hausa: A kan kãfirai, bã mai sauƙi ba ne.

verses.english: Leave Me with the one I created alone
verses.hausa: Ka bar Ni da wanda Na halitta, yana shi kaɗai,

verses.english: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
verses.hausa: Kuma Na sanya masa dũkiya shimfiɗaɗɗiya

verses.english: And children present [with him]
verses.hausa: Da ɗiyã halartattu,

verses.english: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
verses.hausa: Kuma Na shimfiɗa? masa kõme shimfiɗãwa.

verses.english: Then he desires that I should add more.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, yanã kwaɗayin in yi masa ƙãri!

verses.english: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.
verses.hausa: Faufau! Lalle ne, shĩ yã kasance, ga ãyõyinMu, mai tsaurin kai.

verses.english: I will cover him with arduous torment.
verses.hausa: Zã Ni kallafa masa wahala mai hauhawa.

verses.english: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Shi, yã yi tunãni, kuma yã ƙaddara (abin da zai faɗã game da Alƙur'ãni)

verses.english: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, aka la'ane shi, kamar yadda ya ƙaddara.

verses.english: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, aka la'ane shi kamar yadda ya ƙaddara.

verses.english: Then he considered [again];
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, ya yi tunãni

verses.english: Then he frowned and scowled;
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, ya gintse huska? kuma ya yi murtuk.

verses.english: Then he turned back and was arrogant
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, ya jũya bãya, kuma ya bunƙãsa,

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.english: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
verses.hausa: Sai ya ce: "Wannan abu dai bã kõme ba ne fãce wani sihiri, wanda aka ruwaito."

verses.english: This is not but the word of a human being."
verses.hausa: "Wannan maganar mutum dai ce."

verses.english: I will drive him into Saqar.
verses.hausa: Zã Ni ƙõna shi da Saƙar.

verses.english: And what can make you know what is Saqar?
verses.hausa: Kuma mẽ ya sanar da kai abin da akẽ cẽwa Saƙar!

verses.english: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],
verses.hausa: Bã ta ragẽwa, kuma bã ta bari.

verses.english: Blackening the skins.
verses.hausa: Mai nãcẽwa ga jiki ce (da (ƙũna).

verses.english: Over it are nineteen [angels].
verses.hausa: A kanta akwai (matsara) gõma shã tara.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.english: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu sanya ma'abũta wutã (wãto matsaranta) ba, fãce malã'iku, kuma ba Mu sanya adadinsu (gõma sha tara) ba, fãce dõmin fitina ga waɗanda suka kãfirta domin waɗanda aka bai wa littãfi su sãmi yaƙĩni kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni su ƙãra ĩmãni, kuma waɗanda aka bai wa littãfi da mũminai bã zã su yi shakka ba, kuma domin wa ɗanda a cikin zukatansu akwai wata cuta da kãfirai su ce: "Mẽ Allah Yake nufi da wannan, ya kasance misãli?" Haka dai Allah ke ɓatar da wanda Ya so, kuma Ya shiryar da wanda ya so. Kuma bãbu wanda ya san mayãƙan Ubangijinka fãce Shi, kuma ita (wutar) ba ta kasance ba fãce wata tunãtarwa ce ga mutum.

verses.english: No! By the moon
verses.hausa: A'aha! Ina rantsuwa da watã.

verses.english: And [by] the night when it departs
verses.hausa: Da dare a lõkacin da ya jũyar da baya.

verses.english: And [by] the morning when it brightens,
verses.hausa: Da sãfiya idan ta wãye.

verses.english: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
verses.hausa: Ita (wutar) ɗayan manyan masĩfũ? ce.

verses.english: As a warning to humanity -
verses.hausa: Mai gargaɗĩ ce ga mutum.

verses.arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.english: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
verses.hausa: Ga wanda ya so, daga cikinku, ya gabãta ko ya jinkirta.

verses.english: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
verses.hausa: Kõwane rai ga abin da ya aikata jingina ce.

verses.english: Except the companions of the right,
verses.hausa: Fãce mutãnen dãma.

verses.english: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
verses.hausa: A cikin Aljanna suna tambayar jũna.

verses.english: About the criminals,
verses.hausa: Game da mãsu laifi.

verses.english: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
verses.hausa: (Su ce musu) "Me ya shigar da ku a cikin Saƙar?"

verses.english: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ba mu kasance munã a cikin mãsu salla ba."

verses.english: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ba mu kasance muna ciyar da matalautã ba."

verses.english: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
verses.hausa: "Kuma mun kasance muna kũtsãwa tãre da mãsu kũtsãwa."

verses.english: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
verses.hausa: "Mun kasance munã ƙaryata rãnar sãkamako."

verses.english: Until there came to us the certainty."
verses.hausa: "Har gaskiya (wãto mutuwa) ta zo mana."

verses.english: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka cẽton mãsu cẽto bã zai amfãne su ba.

verses.english: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
verses.hausa: Haba! Me ya same su, suka zama mãsu bijirewa daga wa'azin gaskiya.

verses.english: As if they were alarmed donkeys
verses.hausa: Kamar dai sũ, jãkuna firgitattu ne.

verses.english: Fleeing from a lion?
verses.hausa: Sun gudu daga zãki.

verses.arabic: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.english: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
verses.hausa: A'aha! Kõwãne mutum daga cikinsu yanã son a zo masa da takardu (da sũnansa) ana wãtsãwa

verses.english: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
verses.hausa: A'aha! Kai dai, bã su jin tsõron Lãhira.

verses.english: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
verses.hausa: A'aha! Lalle ne, shi (Alƙur'ãni) tunãtarwa ce.

verses.english: Then whoever wills will remember it.
verses.hausa: Dõmin wanda ya so, ya tuna.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.english: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã zã su tuna ba fãce idan Allah Ya so, Shi ne Ya cancanta a bi Shi da taƙawa kuma Ya cancanta ga Ya yi gãfara.
